name: Always Support the Danger Layer
description:
Help the small wizard getting back his magic ball! 

But beware: Not only are you trapped in a maze. In order to get to the end of it, you'll have to switch worlds and avoid the other world's hellish creatures!

A game about smart estimations, quick decision making and keeping your cool.

Credits: 

Cordula Heithausen - Game Design, Programming, Visuals

Olivier Haas - Sound Design, Music, FMOD Integration
